description: SimplexBook Markup to XML conversion mapping with complete schema definitions

sbm_book.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="book">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:sequence>
      <xs:element ref="metadata" minOccurs="0"/>
      <xs:element ref="chapter" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
    </xs:sequence>
    <xs:attribute name="title" type="xs:string" use="required"/>
    <xs:attribute name="lang" type="xs:language" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:ID" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="version" type="xs:string" use="optional"/>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_metadata.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="metadata">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:sequence>
      <xs:element ref="author" minOccurs="0"/>
      <xs:element ref="publisher" minOccurs="0"/>
      <xs:element ref="publication_date" minOccurs="0"/>
      <xs:element ref="description" minOccurs="0"/>
      <xs:element ref="keywords" minOccurs="0"/>
      <xs:element ref="rights" minOccurs="0"/>
    </xs:sequence>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_author.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="author">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:simpleContent>
      <xs:extension base="xs:string">
        <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string" use="required"/>
        <xs:attribute name="email" type="xs:string" use="optional"/>
        <xs:attribute name="role" type="xs:string" use="optional"/>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:simpleContent>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_publisher.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="publisher">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:simpleContent>
      <xs:extension base="xs:string">
        <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string" use="required"/>
        <xs:attribute name="url" type="xs:anyURI" use="optional"/>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:simpleContent>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_chapter.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="chapter">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:sequence>
      <xs:element ref="section" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
    </xs:sequence>
    <xs:attribute name="title" type="xs:string" use="required"/>
    <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:ID" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="lang" type="xs:language" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="number" type="xs:integer" use="optional"/>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_section.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="section">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:sequence>
      <xs:group ref="content" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
    </xs:sequence>
    <xs:attribute name="title" type="xs:string" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:ID" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="level" type="xs:positiveInteger" use="optional" default="1"/>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_paragraph.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="paragraph">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:group ref="text_content"/>
    <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:ID" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="class" type="xs:string" use="optional"/>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_heading.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="heading">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:group ref="text_content"/>
    <xs:attribute name="level" type="xs:positiveInteger" use="required"/>
    <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:ID" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="title" type="xs:string" use="optional"/>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_bold.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="emphasis">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:group ref="text_content"/>
    <xs:attribute name="type">
      <xs:simpleType>
        <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
          <xs:enumeration value="strong"/>
          <xs:enumeration value="italic"/>
        </xs:restriction>
      </xs:simpleType>
    </xs:attribute>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_code.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="code">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:simpleContent>
      <xs:extension base="xs:string">
        <xs:attribute name="language" type="xs:string" use="optional"/>
        <xs:attribute name="inline" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="true"/>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:simpleContent>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_superscript.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="script">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:group ref="text_content"/>
    <xs:attribute name="position">
      <xs:simpleType>
        <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
          <xs:enumeration value="super"/>
          <xs:enumeration value="sub"/>
        </xs:restriction>
      </xs:simpleType>
    </xs:attribute>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_ordered_list.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="list">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:sequence>
      <xs:element ref="item" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
    </xs:sequence>
    <xs:attribute name="type">
      <xs:simpleType>
        <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
          <xs:enumeration value="ordered"/>
          <xs:enumeration value="unordered"/>
        </xs:restriction>
      </xs:simpleType>
    </xs:attribute>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_list_item.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="item">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:group ref="content" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
    <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:ID" use="optional"/>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_definition.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="definition">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:group ref="content" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
    <xs:attribute name="term_id" type="xs:IDREF" use="optional"/>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_link.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="link">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:group ref="text_content"/>
    <xs:attribute name="target" type="xs:anyURI" use="required"/>
    <xs:attribute name="type" type="xs:string" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="title" type="xs:string" use="optional"/>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_citation.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="citation">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:simpleContent>
      <xs:extension base="xs:string">
        <xs:attribute name="ref" type="xs:string" use="required"/>
        <xs:attribute name="style" type="xs:string" use="optional"/>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:simpleContent>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_table.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="table">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:sequence>
      <xs:element ref="caption" minOccurs="0"/>
      <xs:element ref="column" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
      <xs:element ref="row" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
    </xs:sequence>
    <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:ID" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="title" type="xs:string" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="summary" type="xs:string" use="optional"/>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_table_column.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="column">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:ID" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="header" type="xs:string" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="align">
      <xs:simpleType>
        <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
          <xs:enumeration value="left"/>
          <xs:enumeration value="center"/>
          <xs:enumeration value="right"/>
          <xs:enumeration value="justify"/>
        </xs:restriction>
      </xs:simpleType>
    </xs:attribute>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_table_row.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="row">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:sequence>
      <xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded">
        <xs:element ref="cell" minOccurs="0"/>
        <xs:element ref="header" minOccurs="0"/>
      </xs:choice>
    </xs:sequence>
    <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:ID" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="type">
      <xs:simpleType>
        <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
          <xs:enumeration value="data"/>
          <xs:enumeration value="header"/>
        </xs:restriction>
      </xs:simpleType>
    </xs:attribute>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_table_header.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="header">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:group ref="text_content"/>
    <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:ID" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="scope">
      <xs:simpleType>
        <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
          <xs:enumeration value="row"/>
          <xs:enumeration value="col"/>
          <xs:enumeration value="rowgroup"/>
          <xs:enumeration value="colgroup"/>
        </xs:restriction>
      </xs:simpleType>
    </xs:attribute>
    <xs:attribute name="colspan" type="xs:positiveInteger" use="optional" default="1"/>
    <xs:attribute name="rowspan" type="xs:positiveInteger" use="optional" default="1"/>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_table_cell.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="cell">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:group ref="content" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
    <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:ID" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="header_id" type="xs:IDREF" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="colspan" type="xs:positiveInteger" use="optional" default="1"/>
    <xs:attribute name="rowspan" type="xs:positiveInteger" use="optional" default="1"/>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_image.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="media">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:attribute name="type">
      <xs:simpleType>
        <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
          <xs:enumeration value="image"/>
          <xs:enumeration value="audio"/>
          <xs:enumeration value="video"/>
        </xs:restriction>
      </xs:simpleType>
    </xs:attribute>
    <xs:attribute name="src" type="xs:anyURI" use="required"/>
    <xs:attribute name="alt" type="xs:string" use="required"/>
    <xs:attribute name="title" type="xs:string" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="width" type="xs:positiveInteger" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="height" type="xs:positiveInteger" use="optional"/>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_figure.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="figure">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:sequence>
      <xs:element ref="media"/>
      <xs:element ref="caption" minOccurs="0"/>
      <xs:element ref="description" minOccurs="0"/>
    </xs:sequence>
    <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:ID" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="type" type="xs:string" use="optional"/>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_math.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="math">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:simpleContent>
      <xs:extension base="xs:string">
        <xs:attribute name="type" type="xs:string" use="optional"/>
        <xs:attribute name="display">
          <xs:simpleType>
            <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
              <xs:enumeration value="inline"/>
              <xs:enumeration value="block"/>
            </xs:restriction>
          </xs:simpleType>
        </xs:attribute>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:simpleContent>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_formula.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="formula">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:sequence>
      <xs:element ref="math" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
      <xs:element ref="description" minOccurs="0"/>
    </xs:sequence>
    <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:ID" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="label" type="xs:string" use="optional"/>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_blockquote.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="blockquote">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:group ref="content" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
    <xs:attribute name="cite" type="xs:anyURI" use="optional"/>
    <xs:attribute name="type" type="xs:string" use="optional"/>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_space.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="space">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:attribute name="type">
      <xs:simpleType>
        <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
          <xs:enumeration value="normal"/>
          <xs:enumeration value="non-breaking"/>
          <xs:enumeration value="figure"/>
        </xs:restriction>
      </xs:simpleType>
    </xs:attribute>
    <xs:attribute name="count" type="xs:positiveInteger" use="optional" default="1"/>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

sbm_aria_label.xsd_definition:
<xs:element name="accessibility">
  <xs:complexType>
    <xs:attribute name="type">
      <xs:simpleType>
        <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
          <xs:enumeration value="aria-label"/>
          <xs:enumeration value="aria-describedby"/>
          <xs:enumeration value="role"/>
        </xs:restriction>
      </xs:simpleType>
    </xs:attribute>
    <xs:attribute name="target" type="xs:string" use="required"/>
    <xs:attribute name="value" type="xs:string" use="required"/>
  </xs:complexType>
</xs:element>

text_content.description: Group of elements that can contain text content

content.description: General content elements that can appear in sections

common_attributes.description: Common attributes available on most elements

id_conversion.rule: Direct mapping with XML ID type

lang_conversion.validation: Must be valid IETF language tag

simple_book.sbm_code:
::book title="XML Example" lang="en"
::metadata
::author name="Author Name" email="author@example.com"
::/metadata
::chapter title="Introduction"
::p This is a paragraph with *emphasis* and **strong** text.
::ul
::li First item
::li Second item
::/ul
::/chapter
::/book
simple_book.xml_output:
<book title="XML Example" lang="en" xmlns="http://www.simplexbook.org/sbm">
  <metadata>
    <author name="Author Name" email="author@example.com"/>
  </metadata>
  <chapter title="Introduction">
    <paragraph>
      <text>This is a paragraph with </text>
      <emphasis type="italic">emphasis</emphasis>
      <text> and </text>
      <emphasis type="strong">strong</emphasis>
      <text> text.</text>
    </paragraph>
    <list type="unordered">
      <item>First item</item>
      <item>Second item</item>
    </list>
  </chapter>
</book>

complex_table.sbm_code:
::table title="Sample Data" summary="Example table with headers"
::caption Data Comparison Table
::column header="Product" align="left"
::column header="Price" align="right"
::tr type="header"
::th scope="col" Product Name
::th scope="col" Price ($)
::/tr
::tr type="data"
::td Product A
::td 29.99
::/tr
::tr type="data"
::td Product B
::td 39.99
::/tr
::/table
complex_table.xml_output:
Product Name
Price ($)
 Product A 29.99 Product B 39.99
Data Comparison Table

content_constraints.heading_level: Must be positive integer between 1 and 6
content_constraints.language_code: Must follow IETF BCP 47 language tag format
content_constraints.unique_ids: All id attributes must be unique within document
content_constraints.table_structure: Row and cell counts must match column specifications
